title: Register Completion
credits: Credits to University of Helsinki course register: 2 (Requires a Finnish social security number).
credits_details: The open university of the University of Helsinki is responsible for registering the credits. Registering the credits is free.
donow: You must now register to the Open University of the University of Helsinki.
Instructions1: You must use this e-mail address on the registration form at part 1:
Instructions2: 1. Fill in the registration form at:
Instructions3: 2. At the form field: Your email address on the MOOC course fill in:
Instructions4: 3. If you want an e-mail notification when the credits have been registered, remember to check the box  A notification of completed studies will be sent to my email (including the grade).
NB: NB! Bachelor's - and Master's degree students from University of Helsinki must also register their credits via the Open University!
grades: Credits are registered within 6 weeks of registering to the Open University.
